SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.staffmanagement

Class StaffManagementService

java.lang.Object
org.hms.services.AbstractService<IDrugStockDataInterface>
org.hms.services.staffmanagement.StaffManagementService
public class StaffManagementService extends AbstractService<IDrugStockDataInterface>
StaffManagementService provides a set of operations for managing staff members, including adding, updating, removing, searching, and changing staff details and roles.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private StaffTable
    staffTable
    Instance of StaffTable used to manage staff-related operations such as adding, updating, retrieving, and removing staff records.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffManagementService

      public StaffManagementService(IDrugStockDataInterface dataInterface)
      Initializes the StaffManagementService with a StaffTable instance and optionally loads data from a file.

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public boolean addStaff(Staff staff)
      Adds a new staff entry to the staff table and saves the changes to a file.
      Parameters:
      staff - the Staff object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the staff was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(String staffId, Staff updatedStaff)
      Updates an existing staff entry in the staff table and saves the changes to a file.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to update
      updatedStaff - the updated Staff object
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if the staff was not found

    • getStaffByStaffId

      public Staff getStaffByStaffId(String staffId)
      Retrieves a specific staff entry based on alphanumerical staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Staff object if found, otherwise null

    • listAllActiveStaff

      public List<Staff> listAllActiveStaff()
      Lists all active staff entries.
      Returns:
      a List of Staff objects with a status of "active"

    • listAllStaff

      public List<Staff> listAllStaff()
      Lists all staff entries without filtering.
      Returns:
      a List of all Staff objects in the staff table

    • removeStaff

      public boolean removeStaff(String staffId, boolean softDelete)
      Removes a staff entry based on alphanumerical staff ID. Supports both soft and hard deletion.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to remove
      softDelete - true for soft delete (mark as inactive), false for hard delete
      Returns:
      true if the removal was successful, false otherwise

    • assignRole

      public boolean assignRole(String staffId, String role)
      Assigns a specific role to the staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to assign the role to
      role - the role to be assigned to the staff member
      Returns:
      true if the role was assigned successfully, false otherwise

    • changeStatus

      public boolean changeStatus(String staffId, String status)
      Changes the status (e.g., active/inactive) of a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to change the status
      status - the new status to be assigned to the staff member
      Returns:
      true if the status was changed successfully, false otherwise

    • archiveStaff

      public boolean archiveStaff(String staffId)
      Archives a staff member’s data by changing their status to "archived".
      Parameters:
      staffId - the alphanumerical ID of the staff to archive
      Returns:
      true if the archiving was successful, false otherwise

    • searchStaff

      public List<Staff> searchStaff(String criteria, String value, int minAge, int maxAge)
      Searches for staff based on a specified criterion such as role, gender, or status.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the criterion to filter by ("role", "gender", or "status")
      value - the value to match for the specified criterion
      Returns:
      a List of Staff objects that match the search criteria

    • searchStaff

      public List<Staff> searchStaff(String criteria, String value)
      Overloaded searchStaff method for searching without age range filtering.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the criterion to filter by ("role", "gender", or "status")
      value - the value to match for the specified criterion
      Returns:
      a List of Staff objects that match the search criteria

    • saveToFile

      public boolean saveToFile()
      Saves the current staff data to a file.
      Returns:
      true if the save operation was successful, false otherwise

    • loadFromFile

      public boolean loadFromFile()
      Loads staff data from a file.
      Returns:
      true if the load operation was successful, false otherwise

    • getStaffTable

      public StaffTable getStaffTable()
      Retrieves the StaffTable instance used by this service.

      the StaffTable instance
